website_summaries.verdict: Your child's Littlest Pet Shop pets can travel in luxury in this pet jet with lots of different areas to play.
pros: Includes 4 pets, 40 accessories, 2 sticker sheets, and more than 70 Deco Bits
Includes a hammock, swing ring, hanging chair, snack area, slide, and a nap area
The jet also closes so kids can pretend to fly it
cons: Takes time to assemble and some of the pieces are difficult to get to stay on

customer_reviews.title: This is a model kit you can play with
customer_reviews.text: Overall toy is not bad, but does have some fit issues, especially with that top. More importantly, plan to spend a ton of time assembling this. I've assembled bicycles, trampolines, toy guns, Matchbox sets and more. I've also built a ton of plastic model kits of my own. This is not a toy. It's a kit. Every piece that could possibly be shipped disassembled, is. It wasn't just about shipping it, it was about the factory saving labor hours. It wasn't difficult to assemble, just time consuming. If getting this for a child as a present, assemble it the night before and put the assembled version in a box.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Brown

customer_reviews.title: Take a guess at what's inside the unmarked. blank brown box?
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a Christmas gift for my Granddaughter. The box arrived yesterday, it was a blank cardboard box, no picture of that the toy was, simply an unmarked brown box!!! The visual is half of the excitement for children!!! Really, it's enough that it requires a tremendous amount of assembly, but for the Littlest Per Shop Jet Playset picture to not even be on the box is more than disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi DeWit

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My LPS fan daughter wanted this plane for her BD. It comes in parts, so I put it together fully before giving it to her. I put it in her room with a scene like animals are boarding on the plane, she loved it, she just turned 6. The pink upper lid is a little bit difficult to open, but it`s not a big deal, overall it worth it as it is so much fun to play with it and all the accessories it comes with. If any part like tail often fall out I will hot glue it, but this set is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: A PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: The part did not fit together. Too many small parts Instruction was not clear, just picture without any explanation. I am a 65 year old grandma and I had assembled many toys in my years but this toy frustrated me so much that I just wanted to throw it out. As of today, the toy is still in pieces because the parts did not snap in together at all. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Fawn Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I received this in a brown box in about 500 pieces. The teeny tiny gems and accessories had to be punched off of their plastic mold. Every sticker had to be pressed on. My thumbs were sore after punching all of the tiny plastic gems and food bits out. It took me forever to completely assemble this flimsy thing because of the tiny details and then my kid broke it within 48 hours. It was a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: KarenS

customer_reviews.title: Plain box with no pictures or instructions
customer_reviews.text: This toy arrived in a plain brown cardboard box with no indication of what was inside. There are no pictures of the toy on or inside the box. It also does not come with instructions for assembly. Doesn't have a very nice presentation when given as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Does not come in box shown, just parts in a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed to give this to my 4 year old niece. It's just all the parts in an unmarked box. She will have no idea what I'm giving her. Super upset with the presentation. I would have liked to know ahead of time. Item is pictured in retail ready packaging. Not what I received.
customer_reviews.author: LoCalifornia

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: The assembly is quite hard for kids below 6 and the instruction wasn't that clear (comparing with Lego's). The sticker's quality is not that good, stickers are very thin and fragile paper without proper care you could rip it during the assembly. Overall, my daughter has been dreaming for this set for almost a year and when she received was something I will remember her expressions for years from now until her new dream toy ^^
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected when arrived
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a Christmas gift for my steph daughter, literally came on a cardboard box. I can’t tell if all the pieces are with it and I don’t wanna have to take it out of the box to check. I literally have to wait until Christmas to make sure it’s all there. I’m a little disappointed to be honest, I thought it would look like the actual picture above. Some of the plastic that accessories are wrapped in is even damaged...
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: I am not happy at all
customer_reviews.text: I wish there were a negative 5 star. I bought two of these jets. I am not happy at all! The jets came to us in a box with about 250 parts each needing to be assembled. After finally getting them put together, we found them difficult to maneuver when opening and closing the lids. This ended up with the jet to fall apart. If they falls apart with us handling them, what would happen with two little five-year-olds? I called Hasbro and they said they would replace them with an item of the same value that THEY get to choose. Come on, Hasbro. They've struck out in my book!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed in the quality!  Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.text: I have NEVER been so very disappointed in the quality of construction of a toy. It took two of us to even manage to figure out how to put it together. It is so poorly made that I'm sure that my grandchildren will lose interest in it very quickly. I should have returned it! Shame on the manufacturer!
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: Lots of assembly but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I love this plane now that it’s assembled. However, it came in a cardboard box in hundreds of pieces. I was hoping to give it in the box to my daughter but had to assemble it first. It is cute, but probably needs to be glued together to be sturdy enough for my four year old. It’s worth it just be ready to build it.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: awkward
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was tedious. I don't want to spend time taking apart the sheets, then assembling the plane especially for the price of LPS. The furniture and LPS characters don't fit all that well inside the plane. The scale of everything is off, doesn't fit well together.
customer_reviews.author: toubob

customer_reviews.title: Assembly and Packaging
customer_reviews.text: Assembly directions are poorly done, and the fit of some of the pieces should be more precise. The fit of the pieces retards free movement of the side and the top of the toy. Lastly the packaging is not as shown in the pictures, instead of a colorful box it came in a plane Corrugated cardboard box, not really suitable for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Philip

customer_reviews.title: This is a nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nightmare to put together. The pieces are cheaply made and don't stay on. The least they could have done was assemble it themselves. At this point we have working on it for an hour. I see much super glue being used in the future. I give it 3 stars only because I do think she will have fun with it until the pieces are lost, or can no longer be glued. edited to add, there is also a piece missing. The little turquoise part that hooks onto the front wheel ... so she cannot put her front wheel on the plane. UGH.
customer_reviews.author: carabi

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is not a great item. The directions are unclear and confusing. There are way too many tiny parts and those included are unnecessary. For the life of me, the wings and fins cannot seem to stay attached. The design is cute and fun but the execution stinks.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Designed Toy
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awful. It had a million little pieces & was impossible to assemble. Parts didn't click together right & nothing fit properly & pieces missing. Bad toy design. After spending an hour trying to assemble, we packed it up & are sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M

customer_reviews.title: Needs to improve on presentation of packaging
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product a 3 star as the item itself is fine however, it came in a plain box. Not fun for a kid who is opening as a gift..
customer_reviews.author: Irene Myers

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my granddaughter from "Santa". Put it together Christmas eve. It was a bit tedious as there are a lot of small pieces that snap into place and weren't always an easy fit. But worth it as she loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Kosht

customer_reviews.title: Not in box as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for daughters christmas gift and the pictures clearly showed it in the retail box, but arrived in a solid brown box so daughter will have no clue what it is until its put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Williams,cffdgvn :) jhyuiuy

customer_reviews.title: Really Cute and Good Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This LPS jet is better quality than I expected given the poor quality of most of the items that go with the LPS animals. It doesn't have the flimsy feeling that the other items my daughter has to go with her LPS. Also, the pieces of the jet aren't constantly falling off and getting lost like parts of other LPS products have in the past. A piece may come unattached occasionally though it takes a good bump or force for that to happen. All in all I would definitely recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: joyfulgirl68

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Such a piece of junk. This comes in a generic brown box in a million pieces. None of the pieces fit together totally right, the stickers don’t stick and it constantly falls apart. Only reason I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 is because my daughter still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Horrible to assemble, no packaging
customer_reviews.text: You can't give this as a gift because it comes in a plain cardboard box and it's completely unassembled with hundreds of tiny pieces you have to rip apart from a plastic frame. My fingers were almost bleeding. Never again.
customer_reviews.author: jinxyone

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: It comes in a million pieces and then it continues to fall apart while played with. My six year old LOVES it but get so frustrated that it's constantly falling apart. I'd pass on this.
customer_reviews.author: L.F

customer_reviews.title: If you don't  like to assemble tiny pieces that don't stay together, keep looking...
customer_reviews.text: I will say that once assembled, my granddaughter was so excited to play with it. We made sure all the pieces were as stable as the toy would allow us. Pieces kept falling off when she tried to open a door. For this much money, I expected a much better product.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Fun but significant assembly required
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute! My daughter (8) loves it and has played with it daily. One warning: it takes over an hour to put together! There are so many little tiny plastic pieces that need to be snapped together. If you're giving it as a gift, assemble it ahead of time and save yourself the headache of an hour or so of work during the party or event. The top is hard to open, so have your child not close it completely, or be ready to help her snap it open each time she needs it. Overall a very well designed, colorful product, once it's all put together.
customer_reviews.author: leo lepore

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: It was a little time consuming to put together but well worth it!!! My daughter is 5 and we assumed it would be a toy she'd play with for 5 minutes and move along, like Most toys. Not the case- she hasn't stopped playing with it for days and takes the pets to different "vacation spots" in our house. She has had more fun with this then anything. Some reviews say it falls apart. If you put it together properly, it doesn't fall apart at all. Awesome toy!!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie S.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design with Parts that Don't Work and/or Fall Off
customer_reviews.text: This toy had good reviews, so I purchased it for my daughter's birthday. It has been an absolute waste of money! The wings all fall off when you play with it, and the parts don't snap together well. The window on the front of the plane won't close and all the plastic hinges pop when you go to open and close it. This toy brought tears to our home and no excitement, given its so poorly made and our daughter can't really play with it like you are supposed to be able to.
customer_reviews.author: Jason hill

customer_reviews.title: Trash.
customer_reviews.text: Trash. Came in a brown box in 18 pieces. No picture or display. Absolutely cannot give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: kids love it, lots of little pieces, lots for parents to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great little toy, about as well constructed as most plastic kids toys are made. my kids love it. there are lots of little pieces though, so perhaps if it is a Christmas gift, put it together the night before, rather than all the "extra" help the morning of. It would keep the chaos down
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: A lot of Assembly but worth it
customer_reviews.text: This took me an hour to assemble but good pictures to follow for assembly and lots of stickers etc to stick on which made it a long process....but so creative and fun. I love it and thought it worth the time to put it together. All the animals fit well and such a cute imaginative toy for a young person.
customer_reviews.author: Nana B

customer_reviews.title: having seen this plane be stripped apart by children like smugglers in a third world country in only a ...
customer_reviews.text: having seen this plane be stripped apart by children like smugglers in a third world country in only a day, i can attest that this plane isnt even worth the $2.73 i paid to have it shipped. requiring more assembly than a 1000 piece lego build kit, i find myself wishing i had saved myself the time and trouble and simply thrown out the contents and just givin them the box itself, for surely it would have lasted longer. i would attempt a return if only i could find anything other than just the sad empty shell that is the hull.
customer_reviews.author: Garnet Herndon-Shah

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Daughter put it together herself and played for quite some time with it. She is 11. Since it was a gift - would have been nice if came is something other than a boring brown box with no pictures to explain what it is
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a couple "need to knows"
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised with this product! Be aware that there's assembly required! But the directions were very clear and I was surprised with how easily the pieces popped into place. It was no trouble to put together and my daughter loves it! Be aware too, there are A LOT of tiny pieces. It would not be good with babies and toddlers around unless you remove those and just don't use them. (They are dozens of tiny accessories that go on the plane and animals. Not really necessary and your kid won't miss them). The plane once put together is also bigger than I expected. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: 2FoxMomma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome toy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 3 year old daughter for Christmas and it was her favorite toy! It took a bit of time to put together but was fairly easy. It comes with lots of accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Ritenour

customer_reviews.title: Expensive and has to be fully assembled..
customer_reviews.text: It's tough paying $50 for something that you completely have to put together.. quality is cheap however I find most toys are made cheaply recently.
customer_reviews.author: Mattmookie

customer_reviews.title: Not a good gift for child.
customer_reviews.text: Too much assembly required. Also product comes in raw card box with no indication of what is inside. No indication of what is inside on the packaging So for a gift for a kid, not a good idea. Would not recommend. Will provide more detail if we are able to assemble. No instructions or pictures provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware of Packaging
customer_reviews.text: This item does NOT come in the standard packaging, but rather a plain brown box. This is fine if you’re expecting that, but nowhere in the description does it mention this. It’s a definite letdown from a gift giving perspective.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eubanks

customer_reviews.title: High flying LPS jet playset
customer_reviews.text: This playset came in many pieces, but was easy to put together with the instructions that were included. (No tools needed). The included LPS characters and furniture are colorful and appealing. There are many very small pieces (hairbows, as well as small playing pieces such as drinking cups and plates) that could be swallowed by younger children. This set will offer hours of fun play to children who love LPS characters.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: What a great surprise! The plane is huge! More little trinkets than I prefer, but the gift was well received and worth the $. Would highly recommend. Item comes I assembled in brown box. Took about 10 minutes to assemble and add details such as stickers and decor.
customer_reviews.author: Presj

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time on this toy. I just gave it to my daughter as a birthday present and it keeps coming apart. So many pieces that doesn’t make any sense to have on such a little plane. I loved littlest pet shop growing up but I won’t buy another one again. So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie L. ODell

customer_reviews.title: Save your money in the trash within 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this thing is the biggest piece of.. for how much it costs. I bought one for my daughter and one for her friend and they both broke and had missing wings etc. Both girls did not rough play with it and from the get-go the wigs had difficulty staying on. I recommend the cruise ship instead.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney o.

customer_reviews.title: Classic
customer_reviews.text: Littlest Pet Shop are back from when my daughter of 30 years old had them - airplane is sturdy and not hard to assemble. Good instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: original package.
customer_reviews.text: The toy looks ok but it's not in a box like all the other Littlest Pet Shop toys. Do not like that at all. This is a Birthday Gift for one of my Granddaughters. The other Littlest Pet shop Toy I bought for her Sister's Birthday is in it's own box.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bc it’s so cute, but the quality is terrible! Pieces fall off constantly. My daughter (4) was so excited to open it, but she (and I!) are very frustrated having to repair the toy every few minutes. Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Gnab

customer_reviews.title: Dont waist money or time
customer_reviews.text: A million tiny pieces to assemble with no picture to go by. Arrives in plain brown box Won’t stay together during play.
customer_reviews.author: MSans1

customer_reviews.title: A kid won't really care...but
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a pain in the butt! My daughter doesn't care, but it wont stay together after initial assembly. We've had two of these now and they both were the same.
customer_reviews.author: Jovonna

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing
customer_reviews.text: Parts missing- wings in the end part. See picture above. I just opened it now because I waited for a good time to surprise my 5 year old. She still loves it but I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: MARY

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: It came with a lot of extra pieces, which is great because you have to assemble it completely and it falls apart easily. The instructions are lacking a bit, but that's where creativity comes in.
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: Very Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It takes about 2 hours to put this together and my granddaughter broke off the tail and the windshield with in a few minutes of playing with this. However, she totally loved it. Just wish it would stay together better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expect it to fall apart unless you get glue!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my oldest, so I know the drill. The stickers will start peeling off in a day, the wings and tail fins won't stay in no matter how much you try and force it. Be prepared to put this together in advance and use Loctite bathroom epoxy to set the wings/tail with. The epoxy remains rubbery so it works great for toy maintaining. My youngest wanted one of her own. This one came in a plane cardboard box... even though I asked for 'original' packaging. What are ya gonna do?
customer_reviews.author: Jae Melton

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: When the box was delivered, it looked as if a dog had gotten a hold of it. It was ripped in spots, dented and there ended up being 7 missing pieces to the actual jet. Very disappointed to say the least, considering this was one of the presents my daughter had asked for and was very excited to play with.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTINE NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: Daughter Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves LPS and she was thrilled to get this. It is really cute!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: She loves to play with the plane.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great toy! She plays with other all the time. Assembly is pretty difficult with all the different pieces. It seems like there are hundreds with all the decals.
customer_reviews.author: HRGuy

customer_reviews.title: LPS Airplane
customer_reviews.text: Does not come in box as pictured. Some pieces difficult but once put together it was nice. Granddaughter loved it. Not sure it will stay together.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Ballard

customer_reviews.title: Literally a million little pieces
customer_reviews.text: This looks nice except it comes in a million pieces!! Cheap and not worth it. The front main pieces didn’t connect right and everything else didn’t fit. I do not recommend !!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Michelle Robinson

customer_reviews.title: No paw prints to scan!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter spent her own Gift card on this excited to add the 4 pets to her collection along with scanning their LPS paw print codes into her game- She was VERY DISAPPOINTED to learn despite the listing saying they had the scannable code that NONE of the 4 do. Very disappointed and not the value we thought
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Bleau

customer_reviews.title: Really wish it wouldn’t have been so cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Wish this would have been all my daughter had hoped for. Absolutely love the idea of it but it is in all honesty the cheapest thing and it’s not worth the money AT ALL unfortunately. This was my daughters favorite Christmas present and had asked for one for a very long time but none of the pieces will stay together at all that she just gets upset and frustrated with it and now won’t play with it at all. The wings wont Even stay on. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jack Craven

customer_reviews.title: Misaligned
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 7 y/o grand daughter. She will love it! I put it together for her so it will be ready to play with on Christmas morning. It was easy to put together although it seems the parts are misaligned. You need to snap the doors shut with a bit of force so they will close and also a bit difficult to open. Hopefully it doesn’t fall apart after a few hours of play time. Time will tell!
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter for Christmas. It constantly falls apart. Yes, directions were followed 100% with assembly. HORRIBLE QUALITY!!! So disappointing for my daughter, who loves littlest pet shop
customer_reviews.author: DONNA W

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: After the initial assembly, which was a bit time consuming, my daughter has truly loved this plane. I do not think she understands the utility of half the pieces that were included, but has a great time with it anyway. It is a rather solid toy with a ton of features, so well worth the purchase. I am sure I will continue to find those tiny little flowers everywhere though!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal S.

customer_reviews.title: Needs  Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Took away a star because it needed Assembly Took about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Melynie Makinen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay put together!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend buying this product. My daughter loves pet shop and I thought she would love an airplane, which she does, which is why I gave it 1 star. However to begin, it comes in a bunch of pieces. Took my husband almost an hour to put together. Several pieces do not stay locked together. Especially the lid of the plane. It pops off every time we try and close it. She has been playing with it without the lid, but the lid has several hanging pieces to store your pets and she wants to use it. So disappointed. Do not purchase this item!
customer_reviews.author: Erica J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for boy and girls alike
customer_reviews.text: Arrived real fast with all parts included. Christmas gift for my 7 year old daughter. She loves it and can be used not just LPS, she has her LOL dolls piloting plane.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Evans

customer_reviews.title: Pet Jet Playset Toy
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons can use the airplane with their LOL dolls. Gives an element of something different. Gave this 4 stars because it takes some time to put it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Should have actual packaging
customer_reviews.text: This comes in a cardboard box even though an actual packaged toy is shown. I wouldn’t recommend anyone buy this if looking to use as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it but, I think it's pretty cheaply made. The stickers peeled off and the tiny pieces that go on the plane pop off and are annoying. The top tail piece also pops off. The characters are cute though.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this thing! Just keep in mind that there are MANY little pieces to this. Do yourself a favor and immediately put them on the jet. You can put those little deco bits on the top of the jet and inside of it. You'll see those tiny holes. That way you don't end up stepping on any because it really hurts!
customer_reviews.author: Conundrum of Esoterica

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Wish it came package with the picture on it like the stores. My daughter opened for Christmas and it was just a brown box filled with pieces to put together so she had no clue what is was till we built it.
customer_reviews.author: Launda

customer_reviews.title: Difficult assembly. Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Tedious assembly and came with missing parts. Even after assembling, parts would come off so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but some little pieces keep coming off
customer_reviews.text: I am constantly putting pieces back on this jet. Little door, window pieces, etc. gets a little frustrating
customer_reviews.author: Sara Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: You have to assemble it yourself, multiple times.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Do not buy this. I purchased this for my 4 year old for Christmas and it arrived in a box in tiny pieces that you have to assemble yourself. The parts are so flimsy it is crap. When my daughter plays with the toy it falls apart constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy B

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: a bugger to put together but worth the smile on her little face.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pelcher

customer_reviews.title: A real pain to assemble with so many little parts ...
customer_reviews.text: A real pain to assemble with so many little parts & pieces. My LPS obsessed granddaughter at first was enthusiastic when she opened but in a few days she moved on to other items that were easier to play with, maneuver & stayed together. Kinda big & cumbersome , it now just sits in her room
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Marvel

customer_reviews.title: My daughters love this toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this toy! They have played with it for hours and hours. However, as a parent,. it is not my favorite. The wings and tail come off easily, and they are constantly asking me to put them back on. It also comes with a ton of teeny tiny accessories that are fun for teh girls, but are also so tiny they get lost and scattered easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Find something else
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to put together and falls apart all the time. I wish it had a more appealing presentation too, it just came in a plain cardboard box. I would not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay C Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter LOVED it. But it took about an hour and a half to put together! Alot of tiny pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Atkins

customer_reviews.title: pretty much anything that you put together falls back off
customer_reviews.text: The plane comes unassembled with about a zillion tiny parts that must be punched out and then put together. The more disappointing feature is that parts keep falling off the plane: wings, the top never stays on, pretty much anything that you put together falls back off. My daughter still really enjoys the toy but gets disappointed when she needs help putting everything back together and she's playing gently with it. Cheap plastic, cheap toy.
customer_reviews.author: S.P. Suds

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this! Waste of money. I saw the reviews after I brought it and they were right. I wanted to put it together before Christmas to make sure everything was there and it was cheap. Too many parts not going together as they should. Definitely will be writing to costumer service!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So glad we bought this. My daughter has wanted this for 2 years. It was super pricey last your. But with the hassle free packaging made it a affordable price. Perfect for Christmas morning
customer_reviews.author: Robin Kay Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Not assembled! A lot of small pieces
customer_reviews.text: A bunch a small pieces! Opened it for Christmas and was disappointed! Trashed it
customer_reviews.author: Raquel Randall

customer_reviews.title: Does not come in original packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product should have come in original packaging rather than a plain cardboard box. This was purchased as a gift and she will have to open the plain cardboard box just to see what it is.
customer_reviews.author: TRISHA BEALS

customer_reviews.title: While the instruction were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Almost 30 steps of instructions to put together and many many many little pieces. While the instruction were easy to follow, pieces weren't labeled and unorganized as they came out the bags. I feel like some pieces didn't click as hard as they should, so they may come apart later, but my 5 year old daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as new and promised
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved it. Actually I bought this years ago and it still looks good. Stickers intact and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Cerne

customer_reviews.title: was purchased for my little girl who is 9. ...
customer_reviews.text: was purchased for my little girl who is 9. she did almost all of the assembly work except for the parts that needed a little more strength to snap together. she has spent many house of playing alone and with her friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Becker

customer_reviews.title: nice gift for my girl
customer_reviews.text: she put it together by herself and had fun doing it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's still a fun toy for them
customer_reviews.text: had this for a year now. It's still a fun toy for them. I would suggest hot gluing any non moving part as it does come apart all the time which is annoying. But over all. I don't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brittania

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this. I bought as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Hinnihu

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: That this for my granddaughter for Christmas. She was ecstatic and plays with it every day!!!. Seem sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: pepin

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: As this was my daughters favorite Christmas present, you can imagine the disappointment to find it without outer box, instructions, stickers and other missing parts. We are making do and figuring out how to put it together, since we already opened it. We'll continue to order LPS items and hope for the best.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful company to deal with. Adorable toy! Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for making this order right! This is so cute and just as described! It’s larger than we thought too...very satisfied THANKYOU
customer_reviews.author: Kittie

customer_reviews.title: Good but doesn't stay together well
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the price. Our concern and why I didn't give it 5 stars is that the pieces fall off easy. The wings keep falling off. It's cute, but you definitely have to "carefully" play with this. Drives my daughter crazy how the pieces keep falling off. But she still loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Melindachas

customer_reviews.title: Lots of small parts
customer_reviews.text: This was a cute gift for my great-niece but it did require some assembly and there are a lot of small parts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy with assembly required. Not too hard to put together. However, some parts don’t like to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Derek MorrowKoch

customer_reviews.title: Be aware, Assembly required!
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it of course. I hated putting it together! Seems like some stickers missing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hankus

customer_reviews.title: This Might Be A Knockoff
customer_reviews.text: The directions are miserable. Several pieces didn’t fit into the slots they’re supposed to and the parts fall out while assembling. If you’re looking to buy this item I’d buy it from a store that you know sells legit products.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice gift
customer_reviews.text: Do not be dissapointed with the package, when you open it you will love it.

product_meta.title: Littlest Pet Shop Pet Jet Playset Toy, Includes 4 Pets, Adult Assembly Required (No Tools Needed), Ages 4 and Up (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe Littlest Pet Shop Pet Jet Playset Toy is the perfect place for lots of jet-settin', pet-lovin' stories. Where should the pets travel today? Wherever they go, they'll enjoy VIP treatment on this awesome jet. With lots of accessories, Deco Bits pieces, and stickers, it's easy for kids ages 4 and up to style and customize the jet in lots of different ways. Amp up pet adventures by using fun accessories such as a spinning globe; a feeder, play drinks and snacks for passengers; sunglasses and hat for the pilot; luggage; and more. Use Deco Bits pieces and stickers to decorate the jet and the pets! Littlest Pet Shop and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: YOUR PETS ARE GOING PLACES: With the Littlest Pet Shop Pet Jet Playset Toy, you can imagine your pets taking off for adventures anywhere around the world
INCLUDES 4 PETS: These VIP passengers are all ready to board the jet for adventure
SO MANY ACCESSORIES: We’re talking 40 accessories, 2 sticker sheets, and more than 70(!) Deco Bits
DESIGN IT YOUR WAY: Customize the playset over and over again
FANTASTIC BIRTHDAY OR HOLIDAY GIFT: This spectacular playset is sure to be a hit with kids ages 4 and up (adult assembly required, no tools needed – promise!)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
